5.name: find_text
5.dom_code: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><block type="controls_whileUntil" x="7" y="60"><field name="MODE">WHILE</field><value name="BOOL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="coderbot_adv_findText"><field name="ACCEPT">alpha</field><value name="COLOR"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">#a81300</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></xml>

6.code:
dist = None
angle = None


while True:
  get_prog_eng().check_end()
  dist = get_cam().find_color('#96b73c')[0]
  angle = get_cam().find_color('#96b73c')[1]
  get_cam().set_text(''.join([str(temp_value) for temp_value in ['Distance: ', dist, ' angle: ', angle]]))

15.name: demo_ar
15.code:
tag_map = None
code = None
lista = None
codes = None
positions = None


while True:
  get_prog_eng().check_end()
  tag_map = get_cam().find_ar_code()
  codes = tag_map.get('codes')
  positions = tag_map.get('positions')
  if len(codes) > 0:
    if positions[0][-1] > 150:
      code = codes[0]
      get_cam().set_text(codes)
      if code == 1:
        get_bot().forward(speed=100, elapse=1)
        get_bot().left(speed=100, elapse=1)
      elif code == 2:
        get_bot().forward(speed=100, elapse=3)
      elif code == 3:
        get_bot().forward(speed=100, elapse=1)
        get_bot().right(speed=100, elapse=1)
      elif code == 4:
        for count in range(2):
          get_prog_eng().check_end()
          get_bot().right(speed=100, elapse=0.5)
          get_bot().left(speed=100, elapse=0.5)
        get_audio().say('Sono arrivato!', locale="it")
      elif code == 5:
        get_audio().say('Attenzione!', locale="it")
  get_cam().set_text('')
